body:
Comment 2: 
I don't think that this is a defect:

a) Doc comments in the same line already do yield a nice
alignment of type and comment.

b) Longer doc comments like in http://golang.org/pkg/net/http/#Request
would actually look strange if all types got aligned vertically.

c) Adding extra rules like "single line comment does not start
new vertical alignment block if not preceded by a blank line"
to keep Request properly formatted while aligning the given
examples is not helpful at all.
